DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify the orofacial difficulties during the maternal breastfeeding in rooming-in.
DOC.detailed_description: Cross-sectional and quantitative study with sample consisted of 28 dyad present in rooming-in of the Assis Chateaubriand School Motherhood during August and December of 2009.
DOC.criteria: mothers of the newborns participating in the study, regardless of the gender, ethnic and/or age. newborns who presented oropharyngelarynx structural abnormality, impossibility to feed by mouth and/or exposed in bilispot.
